short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension based on data provided by the They Work For You API (http://www.theyworkforyou.com/api).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MP Info uses data provided by the They Work For You API (http://www.theyworkforyou.com/api) to show information about British Members of Parliament. Names of MPs are highlighted on your web page and hovering over them shows a tool-tip showing the MP's name, party, constituency and voting record (according to a list of policies supplied by They Work For You).
